entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Periods of drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
